DescriptionData.Title: Aqualon Brushes - #1 Round
DescriptionData.Description: Aqualon Round #1 Face Painting Brush #R2250-1 works well for very small details. A Royal Aqualon brush is made of synthetic filament, nickel-plated brass ferrule, and a clear acrylic handle. Aqualon brushes are admired for their fine points, sharp edges, outstanding spring and exceptional durability. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. The Aqualon Round #1 Brush is perfect for creating fine details like spider's legs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Aqualon small round face painting brush
Features synthetic filament bristles, nickel plated ferrules, and a clear acrylic handle

DescriptionData.Title: Aqualon Brushes - #2 Round

Aqualon brushes are admired for their fine points, sharp edges, outstanding spring and exceptional durability. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. The Aqualon Round #2 Brush is perfect for outlining and highlighting.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Aqualon small round face painting brush
Features synthetic filament bristles, nickel plated ferrules, and a clear acrylic handle

DescriptionData.Description: Aqualon Round #3 Face Painting Brush #R2250-3 works well for detailed face painting. A Royal Aqualon brush is made of synthetic filament, nickel-plated brass ferrule, and a clear acrylic handle. Aqualon brushes are admired for their fine points, sharp edges, outstanding spring and exceptional durability. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. The Aqualon Round #3 Brush is perfect for outlining and highlighting.

DescriptionData.Title: Majestic Round Brush Set (7 Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Majestic Round Face Painting Brush set includes 7 brushes with a range of small and medium sized face painting brushes. Royal Majestic brushes are made of synthetic filament, black anodized brass ferrule, and a Silk Touch kiln-dried hardwood handle. Majestic brushes are admired for their capacity for holding face paint, weightless feel, durability and snap. The Majestic round brush set comes with the following brushes: Majestic #1 Round Brush (#R4250-1), Majestic #2 Round Brush (#R4250-2), Majestic #3 Round Brush (#R4250-3), Majestic #4 Round Brush (#R4250-4), Majestic #5 Round Brush (#R4250-5), Majestic #6 Round Brush (#R4250-6), and the Majestic #8 Round Brush (#R4250-8).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes the 7 round brushes in various sizes
Bristles are made of a synthetic filament with a black anodized ferrule, and a silk touch kiln-dried hardwood handle

DescriptionData.Title: Soft Grip Brushes - 1/2" Filbert Comb
DescriptionData.Description: Soft Grip 1/2 in Filbert Comb Face Painting Brush #SG930 serves as a good medium brush for blending and shading. Soft Grip brushes are made of Golden Taklon fibers, silver-colored aluminum ferrule, and a blue tipped acrylic handle. Each Soft Grip has a patented Soft-Grip for extra comfort while face painting. The Soft Grip 1/2 in Filbert Comb Brush is ideal for spectacular eye effects.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made of golden Taklon fibers with a silver-colored aluminum ferrule, and a blue tipped acrylic handle

The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. The Soft Grip #6 Round Short Hair Brush is ideal for spots on a leopard.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Soft Grip round short haired brush
Made of golden Taklon fibers with a silver-colored aluminum ferrule, and a blue tipped acrylic handle

DescriptionData.Title: Royal And Langnickel MODA Total Face Brush 7 pc Set - Black
DescriptionData.Description: Royal And Langnickel MODA brush sets are stylish and beautiful brushes that cover all of your face makeup needs. They are designed with high quality material and are comfortable to use.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes 6 brushes for a variety of makeup needs - powder brush, foundation brush, angle eye shadow brush, smoky eye brush, brow brush and lip brush
Portable, easy to carry, easy to access case
Stylish with matching handles, ferrules and color tipped bristles
